QuestData.Title: Doomcaller's Footwraps
QuestData.Description: Qiraji magic is strong and ancient. The most powerful qiraji wield items of such might, they'd give pause even to a dragon.$B$BBring me the qiraji bindings of dominance and other minor components by and I'll create a set of powerful boots for you.$B$BYou will find them useful in the fight against the enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Dominance, 2 Idols of Night, 5 Clay Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj. This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've acquired the items I requested, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $N. You've proven you're no ordinary mortal.$B$BI give you these with the confidence they'll aid you in crushing the vile qiraji.
